summary: THE CONSUMER HAD A RECALL #B15, BUT THE THROTTLE WAS STICKING AT TIMES.  THE CONSUMER FOUND OUT THAT THE BRACKET FOR THE BELL CRANK WAS MISSING, CAUSING THE LINKAGES TO TWIST.  THE ACCELERATOR WAS STICKING, AND FOUND THE TPS WIRING BRACKET NOT BOTTLED UP, THE TPS BOLTS WERE LOOSE AND REAR HALF OF THE BELL CRANK WERE BROKEN CAUSING THE BELL CRANK TO PULL SIDEWAYS, BINDING THE THROTTLE.  THE BACK PART OF THE BELL CRANK WAS REPLACED.  SCC
